Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Hyde Park Speakers' Corner and Selfridges. This 4-star hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Hyde Park Speakers' Corner and Selfridges. This 4-star hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Marble Arch - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Portman Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Selfridges - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hyde Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Wallace Collection - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
London Business School - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Regent's Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Grosvenor Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Royal Academy of Music - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Queen Mary's Gardens - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 20 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park are:
London (LCY-London City) - 15.4 km / 9.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 40.1 km / 24.9 mi

The preferred airport for Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park is London (LHR-Heathrow).

  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
Please note that currently, the hotel is undergoing a complete refurbishment until the end of June 2019 when we formally close our doors as a Shaftesbury Metropolis. During this summer period, there may be inconvenience at the hotel, as not all the facilities (such as our gym and restaurant) are operational and there are builders on the premises. Our management strives to make your stay comfortable as possible and to restrict any impact of the works on your stay
